title: Help please?
body: For some reason every time I play league my character tends to lag a lot even though I have around 33 ping, any advice or help with that?

replies.body: Can you give me a more in-depth explanation of what you're seeing specifically? This may be packet loss as *Hyperion* mentioned, but I'd like to ensure it isn't something else.

Hello, sounds like packet loss. Can you try these tutorials:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader
